title: Slice into Zarr arrays in R

Array Class — Array
text: store Array store, already initialized. chunk_store Separate storage chunks. provided, store used storage chunks metadata. path Storage path. String, optional. read_only True array protected modification. synchronizer Array synchronizer. Object, optional. cache_metadata True (default), array configuration metadata cached. False, metadata reloaded prior data access modification. cache_attrs True (default), user attributes cached. False, attributes reloaded prior data access modification. write_empty_chunks True, chunks stored regardless contents. False (default), chunk compared array's fill value prior storing. chunk uniformly equal fill value, chunk stored, store entry chunk's key deleted.
